The Myocardial Infarction Dimensional Assessment Scale ( MIDAS ) is a patient generated disease - specific health status measure for individuals with myocardial infarction .The MIDAS was developed in response to generic instruments failing to measure aspects of myocardial infarction ( MI ) specific to this patient group e.g. confidence and lifestyle changes [ 1 ] .
